_sText:
ZE_ICECAVE_ESCAPE_V2
******************
Map made by: Westsid3r

*Thanks to:
I3d- servers, Eastsider for testing the map, Skaelman and Gargantua for some support/advice.
**Special thanks to SALEM for giving me hope to fix this map another time!

****************

It's a v2 version of the ze_icecave_escape_fixed, which wasn't really fixed. It had some glitches, like the water glitch, and blocking when played on a server with many slots.

1. 2 New boatescapes, arctic boats.

2. When calling rescue, both will arrive around 30 seconds, and leave after 10 when u jump on boat or press the button in the lift/tramp.

3. Total 4 ropes in second part of the cave. Also added a icebridge, that speeds up the way a lil. But breaks after 5 seconds when passing it, you have to be quick.

4. Removed second igloo, this time just shoot on electric generator and then hit the tnt in the igloo.
Also removed the gate/fence, you needed to jump on snowmans hat to break. 

5. Made more ways to the ladders

6. Ladders are wider now.

*7. There is a secret spot/way where activate 2 traps "doesnt kill".

8. Nuke has sound, also made more houses for the fights, if zombies come by boats or tramp/lift.

9. Added props, boxes and vending machines, so you can defend the escape zone. *NOTE: There is a trap at the escape zone that instant kills when being pressed, you have to be in time and you only have one chance each round*

Thanks for downloading & playing it!

//Westsid3r
